citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:50 AM on 05-
May-2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the facility door and calling the phone number
on file. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
Additional Inspectors:
Jonathan Tomkovitch, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:50 AM on 05-
May-2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the facility door and calling the phone number 
on file. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Jonathan Tomkovitch, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section
